content:
I have a question is there something like a Sandbox to test the FHIR API with something like
a test database with fake data ?

I'm asking this because we planning to support FHIR in our company.

Kind Regards.
There are publicly available servers and open-source projects. http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Support_Page

Stefan, even better - there is a cloud test platform for both FHIR Clients and FHIR Servers to test against. It is Open Access - visit www.touchstone.com - feel free to reach out if you have any questions. Enjoy
